Graphics parameters

Source: R/par.R
with_par.Rd

Temporarily change graphics parameters.

Usage

with_par(new, code, no.readonly = FALSE)

local_par(
  .new = list(),
  ...,
  no.readonly = FALSE,
  .local_envir = parent.frame()
)

Arguments

new, .new

[named list]
New graphics parameters and their values

code

[any]
Code to execute in the temporary environment

no.readonly

[logical(1)]
see par() documentation.

...

Additional graphics parameters and their values.

.local_envir

[environment]
The environment to use for scoping.

Value

[any]
The results of the evaluation of the code argument.

See also

withr for examples

par()

Examples

old <- par("col" = "black")

# This will be in red
with_par(list(col = "red", pch = 19),
  plot(mtcars$hp, mtcars$wt)
)


# This will still be in black
plot(mtcars$hp, mtcars$wt)


par(old)
